1.0.0.name: wordpress/xin-magazine
1.0.0.description: XIN Magazine Theme changes your blog instantly into a colorful magazine. All you need is to select the categories and your favorite colors using drag and drop admin panel. It is a Mobile First theme based on Foundation 4 Framework. It features magazine layout with responsive sidebars. XIN Magazine has many easy to use theme options and build-in Google Fonts support.
